contents:
我也是转的，欢迎大家拿出去多宣发 

另外请大家转这个推：

Video shows that #hkpolice said: We go to #polyU to kill cockroaches. We want the #TiananmenSquareMassacre2019 to repeat. #PoliceBrutalityhk #PoliceStatehk
